#summary ZJS Features At A Glance
#labels Featured

=Features=

Many of the features of ZJS are implemented as "pseudo-keywords":

 * *[Class $class]*
 * *[mixin $mixin]*
 * *[namespace $namespace]*
 * *[panic $panic]*
 * *[priority $priority]*
 * *[static $static]*
 * *[super $super]*
 * *[using $using]*
 * *[throw $throw]* (V1.1+)

New in V2.0:

 * *[ajax ajax]*
 * *[browser Browser detection]*
 * *[singleton $singleton]*
 * *[enum $enum]*
 * *[eval $eval]*
 * *[module $module/$requires]*
 * *[import $import]*
 * *[foreach2 $foreach/$break]*
 * *[log $log]*
 * *[conditionalMembers Conditional Class/Namespace Members]*
 * *[advnamespace Advanced $namespace controls ($override/$overwrite/$replace)]*
 * *[new Advanced object instantiation ($new)]*

 New in V3.0:

 * *[events $events]*
 * *[foreach Improved $foreach]*
 
Others are more traditional methods:

 * [zjsutil Utility Methods]
 * [string String.prototype Extensions]
 * [function Function.prototype Extensions]

And some miscellaneous support:

 * [build Build Process] - use jsmin from Ant
 * [testing Unit Testing] - run unit tests for !JavaScript from Ant!
